function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Direct and indirect spread of the COVID-19 infection through respiratory droplets and fecal-oral routes.","Impact":"High morbidity and mortalities in humans.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce respiratory droplet transmission and fecal-oral transmission, such as physical distancing and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and sanitation equipment.","People":"Population in various countries, healthcare workers, non-healthcare workers.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, facility managers."},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 within healthcare and non-healthcare facilities, leading to infections and deaths among healthcare workers and others.","Impact":"Overwhelming of health systems and high infection rates among healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, use of PPE, implementation of occupational health and safety (OH&S) management systems.","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), ventilation systems, air purification technology.","People":"Healthcare workers, non-healthcare workers, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, occupational health and safety teams, government agencies."},{"Description":"Risk of overwhelming health systems in resource-limited settings due to the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Strain on limited healthcare resources and increased difficulty in providing adequate care to patients.","Mitigation":"Implementing strategies to increase healthcare capacity, providing training and support to healthcare workers, and securing necessary medical supplies and equipment.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring systems, mobile medical units.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, public health authorities."}]}
